title: Games disconnecting and going MIA
body:
Just played two ranked games, and at about 30-40 minutes in on both of them, I got a "reconnecting" message. (No net problems, I can assure you. Got a live stream playing in the background, and a skype call on) After closing out of my client and logging back in, I couldn't reconnect; instead I could start an entirely new game. They're completely MIA on my match history, including on sites like OP.gg etc.
 {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body: Thanks for the heads up, this is being investigated.  The game should act as if it never existed, so it shouldn't impact your stats.  I don't have any updates or info to share right now, but I appreciate the report!
